description: The Taurus Mountains in southern Turkey, the modern Toros Dağları.
details:
The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Toros Dağları

The Taurus Mountain chain is typically divided into three groups as follows; Western Taurus (Batı Toroslar), Central Taurus (Orta Toroslar), and the Southeastern Taurus (Güneydoğu Toroslar)

properties.description: A representative point location for the mountain chain based on a node derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Taurus Mountains
